I love that I can wear this watch and it matches so perfectly! I also have freakishly tiny wrists so I was really worried that the watch face would look ridiculous but it didn't at all- its the perfect size. I did have to get about 4 links removed which took about 5min and $6 at my local watch repair shop. Amazon has the best price though so I still came out ahead than if I were to buy it elsewhere. It also arrived at my door in one day, very happy I made this purchase!
